languages.text: "Что?! Кровавый старик, почему твои слуги сразу не сказали, что за мной идут враги?! Ты обманул меня, заставил сбежать от битвы!"
"What? You crooked old spider! Why did your servants not tell me the enemy was coming? You tricked me into fleeing from battle!"
languages.original_text: "Что?! Кровавый старик, почему твои слуги сразу не сказали, что за мной идут враги?! Ты обманул меня, заставил сбежать от битвы!"

traits.locale_text: "What?! Bloody old man, why didn't your servants tell me the enemy was coming?! You tricked me into running away from battle!"
"What?! Bloody old man, why didn't your servants tell me the enemy was coming?! You tricked me into running away from battle!"
"What! You depraved old man! Why did your servants not inform me the enemy was coming? You tricked me into fleeing from battle!"
"What! You depraved old man! Why did your servants not inform me the enemy was coming? You tricked me into fleeing from battle!"
"What? You crooked old spider! Why did your servants not tell me the enemy was coming? You tricked me into fleeing from battle!"
"What? You crooked old spider! Why did your servants not tell me the enemy was coming? You tricked me into fleeing from battle!"

languages.text: «¿Qué? ¡Araña retorcida! ¿Por qué no me han informado tus sirvientes de la venida del enemigo? ¡Me has engañado para que rehuyera el combate!».
languages.original_text: "What? You crooked old spider! Why did your servants not tell me the enemy was coming? You tricked me into fleeing from battle!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? ¡Araña retorcida! ¿Por qué no me han informado tus sirvientes de la venida del enemigo? ¡Me has engañado para que rehuyera el combate!».

languages.text: 「何？ねじ曲がった腐れ蜘蛛め！なぜお前の従者たちは、敵の襲来を私に告げない？私を騙して船上から離れさせたな！」
languages.original_text: "What? You crooked old spider! Why did your servants not tell me the enemy was coming? You tricked me into fleeing from battle!"

traits.locale_text: 「何？ねじ曲がった腐れ蜘蛛め！なぜお前の従者たちは、敵の襲来を私に告げない？私を騙して船上から離れさせたな！」

languages.text: “什么？你这只狡诈的老蜘蛛！你的仆人为什么不告诉我敌人已经来了？你诱骗我临阵脱逃！”
languages.original_text: "What? You crooked old spider! Why did your servants not tell me the enemy was coming? You tricked me into fleeing from battle!"

traits.locale_text: “什么？你这只狡诈的老蜘蛛！你的仆人为什么不告诉我敌人已经来了？你诱骗我临阵脱逃！”

languages.text: "Was? Ihr verfluchte alte Spinne! Warum haben Eure Diener mir nicht gesagt, dass der Feind naht? Ihr habt mich durch eine List dazu gebracht, aus der Schlacht zu fliehen!"
languages.original_text: "What? You crooked old spider! Why did your servants not tell me the enemy was coming? You tricked me into fleeing from battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Was? Ihr verfluchte alte Spinne! Warum haben Eure Diener mir nicht gesagt, dass der Feind naht? Ihr habt mich durch eine List dazu gebracht, aus der Schlacht zu fliehen!"

languages.text: « Quoi ? Vieux serpent ! Pourquoi vos serviteurs ne m'ont-ils pas averti que l'ennemi était proche ? Vous m'avez menti pour m'éloigner du combat ! »
languages.original_text: "What? You crooked old spider! Why did your servants not tell me the enemy was coming? You tricked me into fleeing from battle!"

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? Vieux serpent ! Pourquoi vos serviteurs ne m'ont-ils pas averti que l'ennemi était proche ? Vous m'avez menti pour m'éloigner du combat ! »

languages.text: "Ne? Seni sahtekâr örümcek! Hizmetkârların neden bana düşmanın yaklaştığını söylemedi? Savaştan kaçayım diye beni kandırdın!"
languages.original_text: "What? You crooked old spider! Why did your servants not tell me the enemy was coming? You tricked me into fleeing from battle!"
